en.introduction: I'm Natalija Milosavljević, a web developer.
en.about: Web Developer Intern excited at the prospect of applying web and developing web applications in a professional setting. Adaptable worker recognized by peers for my effective problem-solving and communication skills. Looking to apply my understanding of Programming Languages and Database Development on real-life projects.

education.title: Front-End Developer course
education.summary: Technologies learned throughout the course: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, GIT, ReactJS. Final project was done in team of four, where I was appointed as Team Leader because of my results throughout the whole course in terms of dedication, learning speed and willingness to help other trainees.

education.title: BSAc of information technology and systems
education.school: Higher Education Technical School of Professional Studies in Novi Sad

education.title: Multimedia technician
education.school: 'Mihajlo Pupin' vocational secondary school of electrical engineering

rs.introduction: Moje ime je Natalija Milosavljević, ja sam web developer.
rs.about: Završila sam Visoku tehničku školu strukovnih studija u Novom sadu kao strukovni inženjer informacionih tehnologija i sistema. Imam osnovna znanja iz tehnologija: HTML, CSS, Javascript, C#, PHP i SQL. Zatim nakon toga kurs za Front-End programera koji organizuje Smart School iz Novog Sada, na kom sam dopunila svoje znanje radeći ReactJS. Veoma sam uporna, kolegijalna i prilagodljiva, mogu da radim sama ali sam takođe i timski igrač. Sve nedostatke u znanju nadoknađujem željom za učenjem.

education.title: Kurs Front-end programera
education.summary: Tehnologije rađene na kursu: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, GIT, ReactJS. Završni projekat je rađen u timu, tema je bila izrada web sajta za Formulu koristeći ReactJS. Moja pozicija u timu bila je Team Lead zbog pokazane posvećenosti, snalažljivosti i brzine učenja tokom kursa, kao i zbog volje da objasnim i pomognem drugima.

education.title: Strukovni inženjer informacionih tehnologija i sistema
education.school: Visoka tehnička škola strukovnih studija u Novom Sadu
education.summary: Diplomirala sa prosekom 8,69. Tehnologije rađene tokom školovanja obuhvataju: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, SQL(MySQL), C#(ASP.NET), PHP, UML. Tema završnog rada bila je 'Kreiranje dinamičkog veb sajta za onlajn zakazivanje I evidenciju pregleda kod izabranog lekara.'
